short_summary: This is a request for proposal for the heavy logistics vehicle wheeled (HLVW) spare parts. The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton within 180 calendar days of contract award.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. .
tags: Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) Spare Parts
Description of procurement: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for HLVW spare parts.
